product_name: FENTY BEAUTY by RihannaShadowstix Diamonds Diamond Veil Eyeshadow Stick
summary: SummaryHighlightsCruelty FreeFENTY BEAUTY's creamy longwear Diamond Veil Eyeshadow Sticks deliver high-impact color intensity in just a single swipe. Each shimmer and mega-sparkle shade were expertly developed to create endless looks with dimension from subtle to shimmered, to wet-diamond, sparkle effect.
details: DetailsBenefitsExtreme longwear formula that's easy to blend and smudge with a brush or fingersThis formula loves to be layered - so feel free to build intensityResists creasing, fading, sweat + heatTransfer-proof + water-proofTwist-up, slim stick for quick, easy + effortless applicationItem 2643934How To UseApply your Shadowstix Shimmer shade across your eyelid and under your brow bone using the flat surface of the Shadowstix and blend with fingers or a brush.Finish it off with Hella Thicc Volumizing Mascara.Pro Tip: Create your look one eye at a time for best results.IngredientsCalcium Sodium Borosilicate, Trisiloxane, Trimethylsiloxysilicate, Dimethicone, Phenylpropyldimethylsiloxysilicate, Polyethylene, Silica, Synthetic Wax, C20-24 Alkyl Dimethicone, Diisostearyl Malate, Lauroyl Lysine, Stearalkonium Hectorite, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Polyhydroxystearic Acid, Tin Oxide, Dicalcium Phosphate, Propylene Carbonate, Mica, Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Isostearic Acid, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Lecithin, Polyglyceryl-3 Polyricinoleate, Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Iron Oxides (CI 77491), Ferric Ferrocyanide (CI 77510).Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Apply your Shadowstix Shimmer shade across your eyelid and under your brow bone using the flat surface of the Shadowstix and blend with fingers or a brush.Finish it off with Hella Thicc Volumizing Mascara.Pro Tip: Create your look one eye at a time for best results.

reviews.headline: Better than the powder!
reviews.comments: Thoroughly impressed with this launch! This is the elevated version of the powder highlighters. When using the powders, I find that I need to work a little to build the product. This is just intense (in a good way) right off the bat. I've worn this a few times and the longevity is great. Fenty does it again.

reviews.headline: Waterproof and transferproof
reviews.comments: I bought white and lilac. They are both glittery and beautiful! The lilac is actually a combination of blue and pink glitter if you look closely. The eyeshadows glide on without tugging, and once they set, they will not budge. No primer needed. They are waterproof and transferproof. Really pleased with my purchase.

reviews.headline: perfect
reviews.comments: Its perfect for small highlighting spots like the inner corner of your eyes or the bridge of your nose. It's so cute, and it was hard to choose between this one and the purple shade, but I went with the white and it's stunning. I definitely recommend it‚ÄîNOTHINGGG beats Fenty highlighters.

reviews.headline: disappointing
reviews.comments: it's just white‚Ä¶ not sparkly at all. disappointed. i love the original diamond bomb but this isn't similar at all.

reviews.headline: Omg
reviews.comments: I cant begin to tell you hiw beautiful this stick is. I feel like diamonds and unicorns üòçüòç

reviews.headline: Absolutely in Love
reviews.comments: It gives the most stunning, radiant glow ‚Äì I'm obsessed! It's long-lasting, super pigmented, and looks absolutely gorgeous on the skin. I can't recommend it enough!
